info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 12:28AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Light snow over Southwest MT early this morning... A band of light snow will move southeastward through Southwest MT this morning. Visibility could fall below two miles at times. New snow accumulations before 5 AM will range from around one half inch at lower elevations, to around 1 inch in the mountains. Those traveling through Southwest MT early on this Friday morning should be alert for changing road conditions and areas of lower visibility.
